creditline: The Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
description: Small round-bodied vessel with short neck, wide mouth, handle and round bottom; brown geometric designs on shoulder; chained brown design on rim; face with linear decorations below on handle

title: Vessel
